1. 下载,编译
	go get github.com/orange-jacky/albums
2.运行
	cd $GOPATH/src/github.com/orange-jacky/albums
	albums conf/conf.xml

	其中conf.xml是配置文件

3.测试
	先起一个mongo,ip和端口在conf.xml配置

	新打开一个终端
	cd $GOPATH/src/github.com/orange-jacky/albums/testdata

	注册用户
	curl -d "username=admin&password=admin" 127.0.0.1:9990/signup

	登陆用户, 
	login是jwt内部模块,只认json格式的数据
	curl -H "'Content-type':'application/json'" -d '{"username":"admin","password":"admin"}' 127.0.0.1:9990/login
	会返回token

	test接口
	其中Bearer 后面的token换成login登陆的token
	curl -H "Authorization:Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJleHAiOjE1MDUxODU3NjAsImlkIjoiYWRtaW4iLCJvcmlnX2lhdCI6MTUwNTE4MjE2MH0.0yKtLPWxZM-Py6KDyDByuYtFZxH1jZSCFRV602sEKBQ" 127.0.0.1:9990/auth/test

	上传,下载,搜索接口都加了用户jwt认证,使用接口前必须要先注册用户,再登陆用户,使用token

	测试上传
	curl  -H "Authorization:Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJleHAiOjE1MDU4MTI2OTMsImlkIjoiYWRtaW4iLCJvcmlnX2lhdCI6MTUwNTgwOTA5M30.MHQfHoTq-6TYfsNX0FGYMj4Nt9PJRMsi_DrEM_oTeec" -F "images=@./100000.png" -F "username=admin" -F "album=test" 127.0.0.1:9990/auth/upload

	测试下载
	curl -XPOST -H "Authorization:Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJleHAiOjE1MDUxODU3NjAsImlkIjoiYWRtaW4iLCJvcmlnX2lhdCI6MTUwNTE4MjE2MH0.0yKtLPWxZM-Py6KDyDByuYtFZxH1jZSCFRV602sEKBQ" -F "username=admin" -F "album=default" "127.0.0.1:9990/auth/download?page=1&size=5"

	测试删除
	curl -XPOST -H "Authorization:Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJleHAiOjE1MDUzNzI2MTksImlkIjoiYWRtaW4iLCJvcmlnX2lhdCI6MTUwNTM2OTAxOX0.RcxsXwlXAXWMPQtbmetrYy7d1tP8nVa5TGn4K6Xub_g" -F "username=admin" -F "album=test" -F "md5=65c4665108661f14c9fc83a9580af609" 127.0.0.1:9990/auth/delete

	测试搜索
	curl -H "Authorization:Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJleHAiOjE1MDUxODU3NjAsImlkIjoiYWRtaW4iLCJvcmlnX2lhdCI6MTUwNTE4MjE2MH0.0yKtLPWxZM-Py6KDyDByuYtFZxH1jZSCFRV602sEKBQ" -F "image=@./123600.png"  -F "username=admin" -F "album=default" "127.0.0.1:9990/auth/search?page=1&size=5"

	相册管理
		新建相册
		curl -H "Authorization:Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJleHAiOjE1MDUzNzI2MTksImlkIjoiYWRtaW4iLCJvcmlnX2lhdCI6MTUwNTM2OTAxOX0.RcxsXwlXAXWMPQtbmetrYy7d1tP8nVa5TGn4K6Xub_g"  -d "username=admin&album=test" 127.0.0.1:9990/auth/managealbum/insert

		删除相册(删除相册会自动删除相册里照片)
		curl -H "Authorization:Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJleHAiOjE1MDUzNzI2MTksImlkIjoiYWRtaW4iLCJvcmlnX2lhdCI6MTUwNTM2OTAxOX0.RcxsXwlXAXWMPQtbmetrYy7d1tP8nVa5TGn4K6Xub_g"  -d "username=admin&album=test" 127.0.0.1:9990/auth/managealbum/delete

		获取用户有哪些相册
		curl -H "Authorization:Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJleHAiOjE1MDUzNzI2MTksImlkIjoiYWRtaW4iLCJvcmlnX2lhdCI6MTUwNTM2OTAxOX0.RcxsXwlXAXWMPQtbmetrYy7d1tP8nVa5TGn4K6Xub_g"  -d "username=admin" 127.0.0.1:9990/auth/managealbum/get

	测试-深度学习
	curl -H "Authorization:Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJleHAiOjE1MDc1MjM5MzYsImlkIjoiYWRtaW4iLCJvcmlnX2lhdCI6MTUwNzUyMDMzNn0.jacEMWozfHJkg-UW7Dw9yHBkZVzLYPVWFqsGFP7jwMM" -F "image=@./jemma.png"  "127.0.0.1:9990/auth/deeplearning"

	测试-物体检测(深度学习做的物体检测)
	curl -H "Authorization:Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJleHAiOjE1MDc1MjM5MzYsImlkIjoiYWRtaW4iLCJvcmlnX2lhdCI6MTUwNzUyMDMzNn0.jacEMWozfHJkg-UW7Dw9yHBkZVzLYPVWFqsGFP7jwMM" -F "image=@./example_01.jpg"  "127.0.0.1:9990/auth/objectdetection_dl"
	
	
4.压力测试
ab -n 1000 -s 100 -p 1.txt -T 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'  "127.0.0.1:9990/auth/download"

其中 n 表示并发数量
p 保存需要post的参数
T 说明post参数类型,如果指定p,必须指定T
s 超时时间,单位秒
